snippet.title: Konami GB Collection Vol. 4 - Yie Ar Kung-Fu (Hard) [GBC] - Real Time Longplay (No death)
snippet.description:
This is a, no commentary, Longplay of Yie Ar Kung-Fu for Game Boy Color played on Hard. The game is part of Konami GB Collection Vol. 4. Another classic game appeared on various consoles throughout the years. The game has infinite loops, but in the GBC version you can finish it after 4 loops. Show a cheap method to defeat every enemy without too much effort. No death run.

---------------------------------------------------------------------
Game is played by me in one go. No save states/cheats have been used. Recorded in VBA23.2.

Please note I uploaded it just for fun, no intention to compete anyone.
